subject: Load cell not working
description_text:
I have the Simmons Pro Pedals the brake load cell isn’t working how can I
get a replacement

conversations.body_text: Hi David Duncan,  Could you please let me know which calibration software you are using for your Pro Plus pedals? If the firmware version is 1.7.1, we recommend updating to SIMSONN Manager 2.1.0. If the software indicates that the version is too old, you can manually upgrade the firmware by navigating to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals-firmware → pedals-plus.sfu.      https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

Yes I’m on the 2.1 it looks like a screw got smashed into the load cell so
if I need to pay for one I will just need one asap thank you

On Tuesday, September 9, 2025, service@simsonn.com
Hello, you may click this link to make a purchase.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference-1
